parameter.name: Subs.XMLService.Properties.Settings.ConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: Subs.XMLService.Properties.Settings.ConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=PKLWEBDB01\mssql2016std;Initial Catalog=MIMS3;User=MIMSWebServiceUser; Password=akkedis; Enlist=False;Pooling=True;Max Pool Size=10;Connect Timeout=30
